creator: dgodithi@digitalthink.com
text:
Currently iam looking for new RollingFileAppender which would rollOver once it 
reaches the MAX_LINE_COUNT. Let me know how i can write my own using the 
existing API

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
You can write your own pretty easily using the 1.2 API (using a modified 
CountingQuietWriter to count LINE_SEPARATOR), and even more easily in log4j 1.3 
with its RollingPolicy (and related) classes.

Please don't open Bugzilla issues to ask for advice: only open them for 
confirmed issues after discussion on the mailing list(s).  Thanks.
